scripts.start:dev: pnpm check-docker && cd apps/web && docker-compose up -d && cd ../.. && pnpm check-services && pnpm install && pnpm -r --filter "./packages/**" build && cd apps/web && pnpm run prisma:generate && pnpm run prisma:push && cd ../.. && pnpm dev

scripts.publish-embed-react: turbo build --filter='@dub/embed-react' && cd packages/embeds/react && npm publish && cd ../../../

scripts.publish-utils: turbo build --filter='@dub/utils' && cd packages/utils && npm publish && cd ../../
